About Me

I'm Zach Holmes, an aspiring full-stack web developer and cybersecurity student currently the head of IT for a small business with 10 staff members.

My journey began with a strong curiosity for problem-solving and innovative solutions. I'm committed to continuous learning and adapting to the latest industry trends.

I have a particular interest in mesh networks and their potential to enhance communication and data sharing. their use along with ATAK (Android Team Awareness Kit) offers real-time situational awareness and secure, decentralized communication.

When I'm not immersed in tech projects or managing IT operations,
I enjoy exploring the great outdoors.

Let's connect and discuss how we can leverage technology, to build a safer, more connected world together. Contact Me
